segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: Use this procedure with the Administration and Monitoring Website to determine the following:
segment.target: Use this procedure with the Administration and Monitoring Website to determine the following:

segment.source: The last known BitLocker encryption status of lost or stolen computers
segment.target: The last known BitLocker encryption status of lost or stolen computers

segment.source: Whether the volumes on a lost or stolen computer were encrypted
segment.target: Whether the volumes on a lost or stolen computer were encrypted

segment.source: To complete this task, you need access to the Reports area of the Administration and Monitoring Website.
segment.target: To complete this task, you need access to the Reports area of the Administration and Monitoring Website.

segment.source: To get access to this area, you must be assigned the MBAM Report Users role.
segment.target: To get access to this area, you must be assigned the MBAM Report Users role.

segment.source: You may have given these roles different names when you created them.
segment.target: You may have given these roles different names when you created them.

segment.source: For more information, see Planning for MBAM 2.5 Groups and Accounts.
segment.target: For more information, see Planning for MBAM 2.5 Groups and Accounts.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Device compliance is determined by the BitLocker policies that your enterprise has deployed.
segment.target: Device compliance is determined by the BitLocker policies that your enterprise has deployed.

segment.source: You may want to verify your deployed policies before you try to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.
segment.target: You may want to verify your deployed policies before you try to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.

segment.source: To determine the last known BitLocker encryption state of lost computers
segment.target: To determine the last known BitLocker encryption state of lost computers

segment.source: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring Website.
segment.target: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring Website.

segment.source: In the left pane, select Reports to open the Reports page.
segment.target: In the left pane, select Reports to open the Reports page.

segment.source: Select the Computer Compliance Report.
segment.target: Select the Computer Compliance Report.

segment.source: Use the filter fields in the right pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.
segment.target: Use the filter fields in the right pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.

segment.source: Results are shown under your search query.
segment.target: Results are shown under your search query.

segment.source: Take the appropriate action, as determined by your policy for lost devices.
segment.target: Take the appropriate action, as determined by your policy for lost devices.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for MBAM?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for MBAM?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: Got a MBAM issue?
segment.target: Got a MBAM issue?

segment.source: Use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
segment.target: Use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
